author: Simon Difford
description: Canon Félix Kir's traditional white wine and cassis apéritif with added vodka 'oomph'. A barspoon of pisco adds complexity to this cocktail but if available instead use Marc de Bourgogne, the eau-de-vie Canon Kir would have chosen.
name: Kir Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
